DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study determine feasibility safety give two dos denileukin diftitox ( DD ) day 0 21 post autologous stem cell transplantation dose escalation fashion . Secondary goal include evaluate effect DD number percentage T-regs peripheral blood post transplant dose level , effect DD T cell ( CD4/CD8 ) reconstitution post transplant dose level determine time engraftment : absolute neutrophil count ( > 0.5 x 10^9/L 3 consecutive day ) , platelet ( > 20X 10^9/L 3 consecutive day ) . The hypothesis study base ability DD deplete T-regs subsequently enhance immune reconstitution reverse post transplant lymphopenia . This may indirectly enhance efficacy autologous transplantation reduce disease relapse .
DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Trial Denileukin Diftitox ( Ontak ) Post Autologous Transplantation
DOC.criteria: All patient age > =18 diagnose Multiple Myeloma schedule autologous peripheral blood hematopoietic stem cell transplant ( AHSCT ) screen eligibility . Patients must fulfill follow inclusion criterion eligible study : 1 . Diagnosis Multiple Myeloma 2 . Age > =18 70 year . 3 . Able understand sign consent form . 4 . Can collect peripheral blood stem cell CD34+ cell dose least 5.0 x 106/kg . The CD34 molecule Cluster Differentiation molecule present hematopoietic stem cell . 5 . Conditioning regimen high dose Melphalan dose 200mg/m2 . 6 . Karnofsky Performance Score ( KPS ) > 60 ECOG ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ) performance status < =2 7 . Kidney function : Creatinine < 2.0 mg/dl creatinine clearance > 50 ml/min 8 . Heart function : Ejection fraction > 45 % 9 . Liver function test : Serum bilirubin , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) less 3 X upper limit normal 10 . Lung function test : Forced Vital Capacity ( FVC ) , Forced Expiratory Volume One Second ( FEV1 ) Diffusing Capacity Lung Carbon Monoxide ( DLCO ) > 45 % predict 1 . Age < 18 year > 70 year 2 . Previous exposure denileukin diftitox . 3 . Patients document uncontrolled central nervous system ( CNS ) disease . 4 . Previous AHSCT . 5 . Significant organ dysfunction deem inappropriate autologous transplantation .
